problems.title: Is This Your Current Reality?
problems.semiTitle: If you recognize yourself in these challenges, the BLive Coaching method is your path to clarity and growth.

problem_one.title: Burnout & Stagnation
problem_one.description: You've hit a financial ceiling or are tired of the 'Groundhog Day' routine. You have success, but you lack true joy and energy.
problem_one.solution: Focus & Energy. Regain motivation and find new, inspiring goals.

problem_two.title: Lack of Clarity
problem_two.description: You constantly postpone important decisions, can't structure your ideas, or are unsure where to grow next.
problem_two.solution: Clear Action Plan. Turn chaos into a step-by-step strategy for immediate growth.

problem_three.title: Imposter Syndrome
problem_three.description: You doubt your professionalism, fear delegating, or rely too heavily on the opinions of others.
problem_three.solution: Mental Resilience. Learn to manage self-doubt and establish yourself as an authentic leader.
